resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106165</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106165</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207237</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Tox Town</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tox Stadt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ville de Tox</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cidade De Tox</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Città Di Tox</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πόλη Tox</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciudad De Tox</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">is an interactive guide to toxic substances commonly found in water, rivers, offices, stores, schools, parks, homes, and factories. Substances include arsenic, asbestos, carbon monoxide, lead, mercury, ozone, radon, and toluene.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ist eine interaktive Anleitung zu den giftigen 
Substanzen, die geläufig im Wasser, in den Flüssen, in den Büros, 
in den Speichern, in den Schulen, in den Parks, in den Häusern und in
den Fabriken gefunden werden. Substanzen enthalten Arsen, 
Asbest, Kohlenmonoxid, Leitung, Quecksilber, Ozon, Radon und Toluol.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">est un guide interactif des substances toxiques 
généralement trouvées dans l'eau, des fleuves, des bureaux, des 
mémoires, des écoles, des parcs, des maisons, et des usines. 
Les substances incluent l'arsenic, l'amiante, l'oxyde de 
carbone, le fil de sortie, le mercure, l'ozone, le radon, et le 
toluène.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">é uma guia interativa às substâncias tóxicas 
encontradas geralmente na água, nos rios, nos escritórios, nas 
lojas, nas escolas, nos parques, nas HOME, e nas fábricas. As 
substâncias incluem o arsênico, o asbesto, o monóxido de carbono, a
ligação, o mercúrio, o ozônio, o radon, e o toluene.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">è una guida interattiva alle sostanze tossiche 
trovate comunemente in acqua, in fiumi, in uffici, in depositi, in 
scuole, in parchi, nelle sedi ed in fabbriche. Le sostanze 
includono l'arsenico, l'amianto, l'ossido di carbonio, il cavo, il 
mercurio, l'ozono, il radon ed il toluene.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">είναι ένας διαλογικός οδηγός στις τοξικές ουσίες που
βρίσκονται συνήθως στο ύδωρ, τους ποταμούς, τα γραφεία, τα 
καταστήματα, τα σχολεία, τα πάρκα, τα σπίτια, και τα εργοστάσια. 
Οι ουσίες περιλαμβάνουν το αρσενικό, τον αμίαντο, το 
μονοξείδιο άνθρακα, το μόλυβδο, τον υδράργυρο, το όζον, το 
ραδόνιο, και το τολουόλιο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">es una guía interactiva a las sustancias tóxicas
encontradas comúnmente en agua, los ríos, las oficinas, los 
almacenes, las escuelas, los parques, los hogares, y las fábricas. 
Las sustancias incluyen el arsénico, el asbesto, el monóxido 
de carbono, el terminal de componente, el mercurio, el ozono, el 
radón, y el tolueno.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207237</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106165</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/tox-town</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
